title: Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols
overview: A fearless warrior and ruthless conqueror, Genghis Khan's epic rise and the Mongolian Empire's incredible expansion are brought to thrilling life in this six-part series. Drawing on a new translation of "The Secret History of the Mongols," the series reveals stunning insights into the life and many battles of the legendary ruler known widely as Genghis Khan.
